word_mean: 钆：一种极稀有金属，属铈类，符号Y，原子序数39，原子量88.905，钆的放射性固位素，原子质量90，半衰期64小时，发出β辐射，可植入体内治疗瘙瘤，或在神经切断术之类操作中，用以制作损害。Z

sentence.Network_en: Yttrium serves as an ideal non - magnetic diluent for the rare - earth metals.
sentence.Network_cn: 钇被用作稀土金属一种理想的 非磁性 稀释剂.

sentence.Network_en: The nanometer yttrium oxides were obtained through precipitation reaction with ammonium bicarbonate.
sentence.Network_cn: 采用碳铵沉淀工艺,进行了纳米氧化钇的制备研究.

sentence.Network_en: We can measure the contents of yttrium with EDTA standard solution titration.
sentence.Network_cn: 用EDTA标准溶液滴定,可测得氧化钇的含量.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: modern Latin, from Ytterby (see ytterbium)

means.word_mean: 1. a silvery metallic element that is common in rare-earth minerals; used in magnesium and aluminum alloys

auth_sentence.content: One-third of the sites yielded rich contents of rare earths and the metal yttrium, Kato said in a telephone interview.
